rows.label: qst000802_msg0001
rows.name:
Heya! Looks like fate brought us
together, eh? Hear me out, will you?

rows.label: qst000802_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm a treasure hunter. Ever since my
grandpa, my family's been traveling
Alst for fame and fortune!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0101
rows.name:
Erebos? The same Erebos that was
written on that knife? We've been
looking for you!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0102
rows.name:
Erebos? The same Erebos that was
written on that knife? We've been
looking for you!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0103
rows.name:
Erebos? The same Erebos that was
written on that knife? We've been
after you!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0104
rows.name:
Erebos? Same Erebos that was
written on broken knife?!
Tora find you at last!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0105
rows.name:
Erebos? The same Erebos that was
written on that knife? It seems we
finally meet.

rows.label: qst000802_msg0106
rows.name:
Erebos? The same Erebos that was
written on that knife? I've been lookin'
for ya!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0202
rows.name:
Wait, this knife...
Can it be...?!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0203
rows.name: You're going to slit my throat with it...

rows.label: qst000802_msg0204
rows.name:
and then take my findings and my
grandpa's treasure for yourself,
aren't you!

rows.label: qst000802_msg0205
rows.name:
Well, I'm not falling for your tricks!
Good thing the old man taught me to
take everything with a pinch of salt!
